name: DarkFighter
description:
If you can accept the round system, and are willing to accept 2-3 hours of customs clearance time, you can pay attention to it.

This is a 2D cartoon turn based stand-alone game. It combines the combat system of eight travelers and the rogelike element similar to Hades.

Game a total of seven chapters, through an area, so that the protagonist to hell, defeat Hades. In the meantime, you will meet merchants, springs and statues, and get different skills and equipment. Make the protagonist stronger.

background

Chaos wakes up from the darkness and erodes Hades of hell. Hades opens the door of hell, and the devil and chaos of hell come to the world.

Chaos erodes the earth, and the gods who can fight against chaos are missing. Only the sun goddess and the God of love protect human beings against Hades.

The human world is eroded by chaos. Some people get the energy of gods and become demigods. With the power of chaos, the demigod began to search for the sun goddess and the God of love.

Set foot on the dark journey and fight against the evil Hades.

Unique round combat

If you haven't been in contact with the combat system of the eight party travelers, please be sure to read the novice tutorial carefully.

Rogelike element

Maps are not generated by programs, but are designed artificially and selected randomly.

Some skills and equipment have a specific random direction. For example, some equipment will appear in a certain area. It's not completely random.

Talent system

The talent enhanced by black crystal (a kind of currency in the game) is permanently reserved and can be reset at any time
